title: Govinda's Restaurant
description: Admission to the Chateau is not required to visit the spacious Hare Krishna Indian vegetarian restaurant which is located next to Petite Somme Castle. Offers vegetarian high quality snacks and meals for lunch, afternoon tea or dinner. Vegans inquire and please inform HappyCow of options. Weather-permiting terrace seating with a view of the Chateau and its gardens. All food is made-in-house. Opening times are April 1-November 14 from 11am-8pm and November 15-March 31 from 12-6pm. Has two children's playgrounds; one of which is located right next to the restaurant.
